phrases: What are you doing making such an insinuating face in someone else's house?
Since you took the bed, I ended up sleeping on the floor!
Man, so noisy right when I wake up...
This, coming from someone who just had a sleepover at my house without permission?
I get the best sleep in this bed.
Then why do not you buy your own?
So, what was the dream about?
You woke up from a dream, right?
Right then, let us get some grub!
Looks like both Carla and you, Wendy, have gotten used to the guild.
She is especially glad about the women's dorm.
By the way, why are not you in the dorm, Lucy-san?
I only found out about the women's dorm recently.
And it turned out the rent in the dorm is 100,000 jewel...
If I would gotten a place there, I would not be able to pay that much lately.
He is Fairy Tail's strongest wizard.
I am not even in his league.
How dangerous can this guy get?
Not like I care, but what is the celebration about?
It is like a festival, Carla!
It is only natural for everyone to celebrate.
It is been about three years since he came back.
There are quests more difficult than S class, called SS class.
But there are jobs even above those, called ten-year quests.
No one has completed them for more than ten years.
That is why they are called ten-year quests.
Gildarts went on one even more difficult, a hundred-year quest.
No one has managed to complete it for a hundred years?!
Magnolia will now change to Gildarts Shift!
Residents, please move to the designated areas!
Even so, is not this going a bit overboard?
You will know if you look outside.
He will turn anything he touches into bits...
If his mind wanders, he will just walk straight through people's houses.
How much of an idiot is he?
So, the entire city was reconstructed with this in mind?!
Right off the bat with that?!
Miss, I was pretty sure there was a guild named Fairy Tail around here...
And wow, the guild is brand-new!
He did not notice from the outside?
I told you to fight me!
You are not changed a bit, Pops.
There are faces I never seen before...
You have got to be kidding me!
Even Pops could not handle it?
Knowing when to withdraw is also being a Man!
Impossible, even for Fairy Tail's strongest wizard?
What in the world is this hundred-year quest?
You are not ready for a hundred-year quest.
Do I look rarin' to go to you?
Even you could not handle it?
Sorry, this will be bad for our reputation.
No, I am just happy you came back safe and sound.
You are the first one I know that is ever come back from this quest alive.
I want to get some rest, so I am heading home.
I wonder what he brought me?
Happy, let us hurry up and go!
Hey... Are Gildarts and Natsu really that close?
The difference in their skills are like night and day,
but it seems like Gildarts has taken a liking to Natsu.
But Gildarts only comes back once in a while, right?
He came back right after I was born...
I am going to catch you a big one soon, so just wait!
But we have hardly had any bites...
Lisanna was with us back then.
Well, it is what it is!
Were not you going to catch me a big one?
You will get one, just wait!
It is like you are the dad getting angry at his son.
I do not want a dad like that!
But you see, since I am your wife, Natsu...
I never gave my permission for that!
It will be true soon enough!
You are so cute when you are embarrassed!
Stop rolling your tongue like that!
Natsu, do you remember your mom or dad's face?
For me, Mira-nee and Elf-nii are so kind, I do not feel lonely.
But I do not know what it is like to feel the warmth of parents...
You know what it is like, Natsu?
But I know about Igneel's warmth.
Why did you leave me behind?
I searched all over for you!
And yet, you were nowhere to be found...
Now that you mention it, I saw some huge footprints on the outskirts of East Forest.
Although I cannot guarantee it was from a dragon or anything...
But, the sun will set soon...
I was pretty sure it was near here, but...
I think this is from a forest Vulcan.
You mean a Gorian like you fought with that other time?
Igneel's not just going to show up so close after I searched for him so hard.
My mistake got your hopes up, did not it?
It is okay, do not worry'bout it.
W-Walk a little slower, would you?
Natsu, should not we wait for Lisanna?
See why I said to wait?
If they find out she got lost, even for a second...
That is terrible of you, Natsu.
Get ready to cry,because you are in for a beating!
But it is nothing a good beating cannot straighten out!
Let Lisanna go, you dumb ape!
I picked it up, so it is mine!
Since you are mine, how about you be my wife?
I am going to be Natsu's wife, so I cannot go out with you.
In that case, I am really not going to give you back!
You bullied me, so I will not give her back!
If you insist I return her, then apologize!
You get down on your knees and I will give her right back.
Sorry, I was wrong back then.
Therefore it is time to finish you off!
You are a very dangerous monkey.
Put down the girl, and leave this forest.
You have matured quite a bit.
Being a wizard is not just about being strong.
Anyone could see what you did for the sake of your friend today was the right thing.
So she is not your friend, she is your wife?
The fog sure is thick, though...
It is especially thick during this time of year.
When walking in the thick fog, it is like walking in another world.
In the fog before, when I heard you searching for me, Natsu, it really made me happy.
Will you come and find me, Natsu?
How about we play catch tomorrow?
I are not going to lose!
But why were you wandering around East Forest in the middle of the night?
The red dragon you are looking for.
Lisanna said she found footprints, so we went to search.
But you really want to meet this Igneel fellow, do not you?
As long as you feel that strongly, you will meet him one day.
Okay, how about we go fishing?
The two of them are like father and son.
I wonder if he brought me some rare flames from foreign lands or something.
It is been a long time since I have been here.
Have things been going well between you and Lisanna?
If that is what you want to talk about, I am leaving.
Natsu... I met a dragon on this job.
I do not think it is the red one that you are searching for.
And thanks to it, I failed the job.
I will ask it where Igneel is.
It flies around the continent, or maybe even the world.
Even so, there might be some clue!
Natsu, take a look at this.
It basically all happened in a flash.
My left arm and leg, and my internal organs, too...
I do not know what kind of guy this Igneel fellow is,
but the black one is an enemy of humanity.
Of that, there is no doubt.
The ones who can defeat them are the Dragon Slayers!
With my magic, a Black Dragon is not anything...
If you really think that, then I will not stop you.
A dragon might be able to.
There are three Dragon Slayers in our guild...
Fate is trying to make its move.
Where did Gajeel head off to?
I was thinkin' of fighting him since I had free time.
Please do not get in fights to kill time.
We might be in for a shower.
I hope that is all we are in for...
But I have never seen the sky like that!
What else could you mean, more than a shower?
You mean, like a showier shower?
You are thinking is even simpler than a cat's!
